软件包 cn.beecloud

类摘要

BCPay This is the core class of BC payment for external invocation consist of start payment, start refund, start query bill start refund query and check wechat refund status functionality.

BeeCloud  
ValidationUtil This class is used to unify the validation for all the incoming parameters of payment.
